body_html:
I don't know what exactly you are talking about @F3PiX, but I'm 99% sure that every skip_validations trait you'll find there was probably written by me 😉 It's something like my own *"pattern"*™ that I throw into basically every Rails codebase I'm on ✌️

What's the problem with it?

body:
I don't know what exactly you are talking about @F3PiX, but I'm 99% sure that every `skip_validations` trait you'll find there was probably written by me 😉  It's something like my own *"pattern"*™ that I throw into basically every Rails codebase I'm on :v:

What's the problem with it?
